::KitKat::
She smiled. " I will welcome all the help I can get. Tell your master 
to meet me here in two days. Then I shall meet him and we shall talk 
further. I prefer to talk to the leader, not the messanger. But it 
was a pleasure meeting you Blacknightmare." she stood up. "Will you 
need anything else? A room perhaps, to say untill your master 
arrives?" 


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Airshadow Nightlight" <airly2000@y...> 
wrote:
> ::Blacknighmare::
> 
> "If inside your agenda's plans is destroy the alliance... he's 
ready 
> to help " said Blacknighmare
